#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar
#define pc putchar
#define mod 1000000007
typedef long long int lli;
void inline scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
void scanint(int &x, int &y){scanint(x);scanint(y);}
void scanint(int &x, int &y, int &z){scanint(x);scanint(y);scanint(z);}
void scanlli(lli &x){scanf("%lld",&x);}
void scanlli(lli &x,lli &y){scanlli(x);scanlli(y);}
void scanlli(lli &x, lli &y, lli &z){scanlli(x,y);scanlli(z);}
void writeint(int x){ printf("%d",x);}
void writelli(lli x){printf("%lld",x);}
void space(){printf(" ");}
void line(){printf("\n");}

int main()
{
    int n,i,max1=0,pts;
    string str,winner;
    scanint(n);
    map<string,int> mp;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>str;
        scanint(pts);
        mp[str]+=pts;
        if(mp[str]>max1) 
        {
            max1=mp[str];
            winner=str;
        }
    }
    cout<<winner<<endl;
}
